description: Erection of a building of part 9 and 23 storeys with basement comprising offices on part ground and first floor level and 61 two bedroom, 60 one bedroom and 12 three bedroom flats; formation of vehicular access and provision of 27 parking spaces with ancillary cycle and refuse areas. (replacement of extant planning permission 07/05042/P to extend time limit for implementation)
